lyric:
[by:龙叔与Doc的旅行日记]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : A. Graham/R. La Tour/R. Martinez/D. Jackson/R Chahayed/D. Banks
[00:00.681] 作词 : A. Graham/R. La Tour/R. Martinez/D. Jackson/R Chahayed/D. Banks
[00:02.043] Woah, woah
[00:05.654] Yeah
[00:06.763] Sometimes we laugh and sometimes we cry, but I guess you know now
[00:11.888] Baby, I took a half and she took the whole thing, slow down
[00:19.162] Baby, we took a trip, now we on your block and it's like a ghost town
[00:25.917] Baby, where do these niggas be at when they say they doin' all this and all that?
[00:32.117] Tired of beefin' you bums, you can't even pay me enough to react
[00:35.718] Been wakin' up in the crib but sometimes I don’t even know where I'm at
[00:39.237] Please don't play that nigga songs at this party, I can't even listen to that
[00:42.919] Anytime that I ran into somebody it must be a victory lap, ayy
[00:46.647] Shawty come sit on my lap, ayy, they sayin' Drizzy just snapped
[00:50.351] This in between us is not like a store, this isn't an closeable gap, ayy
[00:54.346] I see some niggas attack, and don't end up makin' it back
[00:57.352] I know that they at the crib goin' crazy, down bad
[01:00.963] What they had didn't last, damn baby
[01:04.004] Sometimes we laugh and sometimes we cry, but I guess you know now
[01:09.230] Baby, I took a half and she took the whole thing, slow down
[01:16.323] Baby, we took a trip, now we on your block and it's like a ghost town
[01:23.399] Baby, where do these niggas be at when they say they doin' all this and all that?
[01:29.566] I'm in the trenches, relax
[01:31.159] Can you not play that lil' boy in the club? 'Cause we do not listen to rats
[01:34.763] We in Atlanta, I buy her a wig, she tellin' me Tay is the best
[01:38.053] Point at the nigga who act like a killer, but you only one from the neck
[01:41.789] I'm like the DaBaby, I'm not just a rapper, you play with me you will get stretched, ooh-oh
[01:47.827] Ran dracs in the hood, surround Drake around dracs
[01:51.233] Even though I got a case, I'ma do what it take
[01:55.123] And I never been in grace and the money's hard to make
[01:58.715] So I bet they on they face right now
[02:01.528] I know that they at the crib goin' crazy, down bad
[02:05.550] What they had didn't last, damn baby
[02:08.401] Sometimes we laugh and sometimes we cry, but I guess you know now
[02:14.086] Baby, I took a half and she took the whole thing, slow down
[02:20.480] Baby, we took a trip, now we on your block and it's like a ghost town
[02:27.897] Baby, where do these niggas be at when they say they doin' all this and all that?
[02:34.835] When he tell the story, that's not how it ain't how it went
[02:36.609] Know they be lyin', a hundred percent
[02:38.358] Moved out of Ritz and forgot 'bout the Bent
[02:40.238] Gotta just call me to tell come and get it
[02:41.920] Got that boy off and I don't want the credit
[02:43.805] If it was me, they wouldn't regret it
[02:45.483] Left me for dead and now they want debit, yeah
[02:49.125] Heart is still beatin', my niggas still eatin'
[02:50.920] Backyard it look like the Garden of Eden
[02:52.669] Pillow talk with 'em, she spillin' the tea
[02:54.461] And then shawty came back, she said she didn't mean it
[02:57.975] It's hard to believe in
[02:58.986] I know that they at the crib goin' crazy, down bad
[03:02.555] What they had didn't last, damn baby
[03:05.923] Sometimes we laugh and sometimes we cry, but I guess you know now
[03:11.222] Baby, I took a half and she took the whole thing, slow down
[03:18.562] Baby, we took a trip, now we on your block and it's like a ghost town
[03:25.401] Baby, where do these niggas be at when they say they doin' all this and all that?
tlyric:
[by:comingdonda]
[00:02.043]D6来啦！
[00:05.654]新专辑名为Certified Lover Boy
[00:06.763]我们时笑时哭 但我猜你现在已经知道
[00:11.888]我只吃了半片药 而她整片吞下 慢慢来
[00:19.162]宝 我们 一起去旅行 我们现在站在你的地盘之上 寂静无声 犹如鬼城
[00:25.917]宝 当这帮人说三说四的时候 人在哪呢？
[00:32.117]懒得和你小弟发生纠纷 你付不起我消遣的费用
[00:35.718]我拥有多套别墅 我都不知道在哪一栋中醒来
[00:39.237]在派对上别放这种歌 我都听不下去
[00:42.919]我每一次与人发生纠纷 胜利总是属于我（Ran与Lap双关跑圈）
[00:46.647]小妞坐在我的大腿之上 他们说“公鸭这绝对飞嗨了”
[00:50.351]我们之间的距离不是一家普通商店 但也不是GAP啊（美国服装品牌）
[00:54.346]我看着那些像倒贴我的凡人 通通都有去无回
[00:57.352]我知道他们在别墅里狂欢 但最后还得孤单收场
[01:00.963]他们没有做坚持到最后的时候 只能慨叹
[01:04.004]我们时笑时哭 但我猜你现在已经知道
[01:09.230]我只吃了半片药 而她整片吞下 慢慢来
[01:16.323]宝 我们 一起去旅行 我们现在站在你的地盘之上 寂静无声 犹如鬼城
[01:23.399]宝 当这帮人说三说四的时候 人在哪呢？
[01:29.566]我回到街区 放轻松
[01:31.159]快把那小69的歌掐了把 告密者老鼠吱吱声哥可不想听
[01:34.763]我们在亚特兰大城 给她买头假发 她告诉我Tay是最棒的
[01:38.053]看 这兄弟装得他像鲨手 但你才是刀刀致命的那位
[01:41.789]我就像大宝 不止十个说唱歌手 敢玩老子 三天之内把你骨灰都给扬喽
[01:47.827]在街区和可人玩耍 包围带着美人得公鸭
[01:51.233]我即使深陷官司之中 不惜一切代价也要打赢
[01:55.123]我从没被人欣然接受过 金钱来之不易
[01:58.715]所以我打赌 他们正脸对脸
[02:01.528]我知道他们在别墅里狂欢 但最后还得孤单收场
[02:05.550]他们没有做坚持到最后的时候 只能慨叹
[02:08.401]我们时笑时哭 但我猜你现在已经知道
[02:14.086]我只吃了半片药 而她整片吞下 慢慢来
[02:20.480]宝 我们 一起去旅行 我们现在站在你的地盘之上 寂静无声 犹如鬼城
[02:27.897]宝 当这帮人说三说四的时候 人在哪呢？
[02:34.835]他在讲故事得时候 这可不是接下来事情得走向
[02:36.609]我清楚他们在说谎 百分之百
[02:38.358]在Ritz-Carlton的豪宅中走出 忘了我的宾利车（Mob Ties？）
[02:40.238]只要打电话给我 过来并取得成功
[02:41.920]这小子保释出来了我是活雷锋 做好事不留名
[02:43.805]如果换做跟着我混 他们不会后悔的
[02:45.483]曾经留我自生自灭 现在又要我帮你们办事
[02:49.125]心脏从未停止跳动 我的兄弟依旧努力工作
[02:50.920]别墅后院就像伊甸园
[02:52.669]和外人枕边密语 大谈八卦
[02:54.461]接着她回来了 说她不是故意的
[02:57.975]我难以相信
[02:58.986]我知道他们在别墅里狂欢 但最后还得孤单收场
[03:02.555]他们没有做坚持到最后的时候 只能慨叹
[03:05.923]我们时笑时哭 但我猜你现在已经知道
[03:11.222]我只吃了半片药 而她整片吞下 慢慢来
[03:18.562]宝 我们 一起去旅行 我们现在站在你的地盘之上 寂静无声 犹如鬼城
[03:25.401]宝 当这帮人说三说四的时候 人在哪呢？
